premise: Bakhtar Afghan Airlines was an airline from Afghanistan, which offered domestic flights. premise: A man who died during the G20 protests was pushed back by a police line minutes earlier, independent investigators have said. He was caught on several CCTV cameras walking up King William Street where he was confronted by uniformed officers shortly before 7.30pm last Wednesday.
